name: Labelmaster OSHA Compliance Kit
description: All-in-one OSHA binder kit with training logs, safety posters, and compliance forms.
target_audience_match: Ideal for busy general contractors who just want to pass inspections without drowning in paperwork.

name: J.J. Keller OSHA Construction Compliance Kit
description: Tailored OSHA compliance kit for jobsite safety and training tracking.
target_audience_match: Built for GCs juggling multiple sites — makes staying OSHA-compliant one less thing to stress about.

name: Safety Services Company Contractor Safety Kit
description: Customizable OSHA safety manual and training tools for small-to-mid contractors.
target_audience_match: Great for contractors who want a compliance solution that fits their size and style — without the cookie-cutter feel.

name: Avery Products Construction Site OSHA Kit
description: Printable and editable OSHA signage and checklists for active jobsites.
target_audience_match: Perfect for hands-on GCs who like to tweak and print their own site materials on the fly.

name: National Safety Compliance OSHA Construction Kit
description: Comprehensive kit with Spanish-English materials and toolbox talk scripts.
target_audience_match: Best for GCs with diverse teams — covers both English and Spanish training without missing compliance beats.
